column4: I have accidentally removed fstab, is there anyway to reestablish it?
yes, that was stupid of me
rewrite it
the file is removed
should I try to use the reiserfs utils?
to recover it
nano -w /etc/fstab
and start writing
dyFrysk: and it brings up an empty file
yes
you will have to write a new one
is it possible to use partman of d-i to recreate a fstab?
I prefer automagic solutions
I think thats almost impossible if its gone
okay, but can you send me your fstab?
i'll put it online for you , a sec
example fstab : http://johanvrt.tomaatnet.nl/fstab
simply adjust it to your needs
thx a lot
and stop playing with sudo ;p
